name: altarianite
effect: Held: Allows Altaria to Mega Evolve into Mega Altaria.
short_effect: Held: Allows Altaria to Mega Evolve into Mega Altaria.

flavor_text.sword_shield: One of a variety of mysterious Mega Stones. Have Altaria hold it, and this stone will enable it to Mega Evolve during battle.
